summary: Nzeru Boost - An educational quiz web application where students can upload their own study materials (documents, textbooks) and generate AI-powered quizzes to boost their knowledge. The app aims to help students who prefer digital learning over traditional reading by providing an engaging way to study through quiz generation from their own documents.
architectural_notes: Web-based application accessible via browser on all devices (Android, iOS, desktop)
Document processing system to extract text from uploaded study materials
AI integration for automatic quiz generation from document content
Backend on Internet Computer using Motoko for data storage and quiz management
React TypeScript frontend for responsive user interface
